info.name: YMA Backend API
info.description: API collection for the YMA Backend application.

body.raw:
{
    "shippingAddress": {
        "firstName": "John",
        "lastName": "Doe",
        "email": "john.doe@example.com",
        "phone": "123-456-7890",
        "country": "USA",
        "state": "CA",
        "city": "Los Angeles",
        "street": "123 Main St",
        "zipCode": "90210",
        "apartment": "Apt 1",
        "companyName": "Example Corp",
        "locationAccessibility": "Front door",
        "deliveryTime": "Morning",
        "collectionTime": "Evening",
        "floorType": "Hardwood",
        "userType": "Residential",
        "keepOvernight": true,
        "hireOccasion": "Birthday Party",
        "notes": "Handle with care."
    },
    "paymentMethod": "online",
    "termsAccepted": true,
    "invoiceType": "corporate",
    "bankDetails": {
        "bankInfo": "Bank Name: ABC Bank, Account: 1234567890, Swift: ABCDEFGH"
    }
}
